18#include <cmath>
19#include <limits>
20#include <cstdint>
21#include <type_traits>
22
23namespace ZXing {
24
25static const float kPi = 3.14159265358979323846f;
26static const float kPi2 = 1.57079632679489661923f;
27static const float kPi4 = 0.785398163397448309616f;
28static const float kEpsilon = std::numeric_limits<float>::epsilon() * 10;
29static const float kDegPerRad = 180.0f/ kPi;
30static const float kRadPerDeg = kPi / 180.0f;
31static const float kDeg2Rad = kRadPerDeg;
32static const float kRad2Deg = kDegPerRad;
33static const float kInfinity = std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity();
34static const float kTinyDistance = 1e-4f;
35
36/// Test the 'closeness' of two numbers
37template <typename T>
38typename std::enable_if<std::is_floating_point<T>::value, bool>::type
39FuzzyEqual(T a, T b, T tolerance = std::numeric_limits<T>::epsilon() * 10)
40{
41 T fa = std::fabs(a);
42 T fb = std::fabs(b);
43 return std::fabs(a - b) <= tolerance * (fa > fb ? fa : fb);
44}
45
46/// Test the equality of two numbers with a fixed tolerance
47template <typename T>
48typename std::enable_if<std::is_floating_point<T>::value, bool>::type
49IsEqual(T a, T b, T tolerance = std::numeric_limits<T>::epsilon() * 10)
50{
51 return std::fabs(a - b) <= tolerance;
52}
53
54template <typename T>
55typename std::enable_if<std::is_integral<T>::value, bool>::type
56IsEqual(T a, T b)
57{
58 return a == b;
59}
60
61/// Test if a number is == 0
62template <typename T>
63typename std::enable_if<std::is_floating_point<T>::value, bool>::type
64IsZero(T a, T tolerance = std::numeric_limits<T>::epsilon() * 10)
65{
66 return std::fabs(a) <= tolerance;
67}
68
69template <typename T>
70typename std::enable_if<std::is_integral<T>::value, bool>::type
71IsZero(T a)
72{
73 return a == 0;
74}
75
76template <typename T>
77inline T Clamp(T n, T lower, T upper)
78{
79 return n <= lower ? lower : n >= upper ? upper : n;
80}
81
82template <typename T>
83typename std::enable_if<std::is_floating_point<T>::value, int>::type
84RoundToNearest(T x)
85{
86 return static_cast<int>(std::round(x));
87}
88
89/// <summary>
90/// Return -1 if x is negative, 1 if it's positve or 0 otherwise.
91/// </summary>
92template <typename T>
93typename std::enable_if<std::is_floating_point<T>::value, T>::type
94SignOf(T x)
95{
96 return T((x > 0) - (x < 0));
97}
98
99template <typename T>
100typename std::enable_if<std::is_integral<T>::value, T>::type
101SignOf(T x)
102{
103 return (x >> (sizeof(T)*8 - 1)) | (T(-x) >> (sizeof(T)*8 - 1));
104}
105
106template <typename T>
107typename std::enable_if<std::is_integral<T>::value, bool>::type
108SameSign(T a, T b)
109{
110 return (a^b) >= 0;
111}
112
113template <typename T>
114typename std::enable_if<std::is_floating_point<T>::value, bool>::type
115SameSign(T a, T b)
116{
117 return a*b >= 0;
118}
119
120template <typename T>
121typename std::enable_if<std::is_floating_point<T>::value, T>::type
122HalfOf(T x)
123{
124 return T(0.5) * x;
125}
126
127} // namespace ZXing
128
